get.description: The List Digest Event Values operation lists the digest events.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of property names to be returned. You can save bandwith by selecting only the properties you need.

get.description: The List Tenant Digest Event Values operation lists the tenant-level digest events.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of property names to be returned. You can save bandwith by selecting only the properties you need.

get.description: The List Event Values operation lists the events.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of property names to be returned. You can save bandwidth by selecting only the properties you need.Here is an example:string selectedProperties = "EventDataId, EventTimestamp, ResourceUri"

get.description: The list tenant event values operation lists the tenant events.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

parameters.name: $select
parameters.description: The list of property names to be returned. You can save bandwidth by selecting only the properties you need.Here is an example:string selectedProperties = "EventDataId, EventTimestamp, ResourceUri"

get.description: The List Log Definitions operation lists the log definitions for the resource.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The resource identifier of the target resource to get logs for.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: The List Log operation lists the logs for the resource.
The List Metric Definitions operation lists the metric definitions for the resource.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The resource identifier of the target resource to get metrics for.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: The List Metric operation lists the metric value sets for the resource metrics.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The resource identifier of the target resource to get metrics for.

parameters.name: $filter
parameters.description: The filter to apply on the operation.

get.description: The List operation lists the usage metrics for the resource.

parameters.name: resourceUri
parameters.description: The resource identifier of the target resource to get usages for.

value.description: Gets or sets the invariant value.

localizedValue.description: Gets or sets the locale specific value.

value.description: Gets or sets this list that includes the Azure event categories.

clientRequestId.description: Gets or sets the client request id.

clientIpAddress.description: Gets or sets the client Ip Address

authorization.description: Gets or sets the authorization.This is the authorization used by the user who has performed the operation that led to this event.

channels.description: Gets or sets the event channels.The regular event logs, that you see in the Azure Management Portals, flow through the 'Operation' channel.

description.description: Gets or sets the description of the event.

eventDataId.description: Gets or sets the event data Id.This is a unique identifier for an event.

correlationId.description: Gets or sets the correlation Id.The correlation Id is shared among the events that belong to the same deployment.

eventName.description: Gets or sets the event name.This value should not be confused with OperationName.For practical purposes, OperationName might be more appealing to end users.

category.description: Gets or sets the event category.

httpRequest.description: Gets or sets the HTTP request info.The client IP address of the user who initiated the event is captured as part of the HTTP request info.

level.description: Gets or sets the event level

resourceGroupName.description: Gets or sets the resource group name.

resourceProviderName.description: Gets or sets the resource provider name.

resourceId.description: Gets or sets the resource uri

resourceType.description: Gets or sets the resource type

operationId.description: Gets or sets the operation idThis value should not be confused with EventName.

operationName.description: Gets or sets the operation name.

properties.description: Gets or sets the property bag

status.description: Gets or sets the event status.Some typical values are: Started, Succeeded, Failed

subStatus.description: Gets or sets the event sub status.Most of the time, when included, this captures the HTTP status code.

eventTimestamp.description: Gets or sets the occurrence time of event

submissionTimestamp.description: Gets or sets the event submission time.This value should not be confused eventTimestamp. As there might be a delay between the occurence time of the event, and the time that the event is submitted to the Azure logging infrastructure.

subscriptionId.description: Gets or sets the Azure subscription Id

tenantId.description: Gets or sets the Azure tenant Id

EventData.description: The Azure event log entries are of type EventData

value.description: Gets or sets this list that includes the Azure audit logs.

nextLink.description: Gets or sets the next link works as a continuation token when all of the events are not returned in the response and a second call is required.

blobUri.description: Gets or sets the blob info.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time of the range for this blob.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the end time of the range for this blob.

sasToken.description: Gets or sets the SAS Key for accessing Blob Storage.

BlobInfo.description: Contains the information for blobs. Each one is used for a specific time range.

blobEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the blob endpoint.

blobInfo.description: Gets or sets the blob info.

BlobLocation.description: Details about the set of blobs containing data split by time.

category.description: Gets or sets the category of the log.

resourceId.description: Gets or sets the resource identifier of the resource that has emitted the log.

blobLocation.description: Gets or sets the location of the blob.

LogDefinition.description: Log definition class specifies the metadata for a log.

value.description: Gets or sets the values for the log definitions.

time.description: Gets or sets the time when the log was generated

resourceId.description: Gets or sets id of the reosurce related to the log.

operationName.description: Gets or sets the name of the operation.

operationVersion.description: Gets or sets the version of the operation.

category.description: Gets or sets the category of the log.

resultType.description: Gets or sets the status of the operation.

resultSignature.description: Gets or sets the substatus of the operation.

resultDescription.description: Gets or sets the substatus of the operation.

durationMs.description: Gets or sets the duration of the operation in milliseconds.

callerIpAddress.description: Gets or sets the caller IP address.

correlationId.description: Gets or sets the correlation id of the log.  Used to group together a set of related log.

identity.description: Gets or sets the identity that generated the event.

level.description: Gets or sets the level (Informational/Warning/Error/Critical) of the event.

location.description: Gets or sets tThe location of the resource emitting the event.

properties.description: Gets or sets the collection of extended properties.

LogValue.description: A log value set represents a set of log values in a time period.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the end time.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the collection.
Gets or sets the value of the collection.

LogCollection.description: The collection of log value sets.

tableName.description: Gets or sets the name of the table.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the first data will appear in the data.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the last data that will this table.

sasToken.description: Gets or sets the SAS Key for accessing the table.

sasTokenExpirationTime.description: Gets or sets the expiration date/time of the SAS Key.

MetricTableInfo.description: Contains the details of the tables that metric data is stored in. A new table is created every 10 days for storing metrics.

tableEndpoint.description: Gets or sets the REST endpoint of the tables that contains the metrics.

tableInfo.description: Gets or sets the list of tables that contain the metric data.

partitionKey.description: Gets or sets the partition key inside the tables that contains the metrics.

MetricLocation.description: Where the data for this metric is stored.

timeGrain.description: Gets or sets the time grain specifies the aggregation interval for the metric.

retention.description: Gets or sets the retention period for the metric at the specified timegrain.

location.description: Gets or sets the location where the data for this metric availability is stored.

blobLocation.description: Gets or sets the location info for this availability.

MetricAvailability.description: Metric availability specifies the time grain (aggregation interval or frequency) and the retention period for that time grain.

values.description: Gets or sets the list of values.

Dimension.description: Metric dimension specifies the dimension name and list of dimension values.

name.description: Gets or sets the name and the display name of the metric.

unit.description: Gets or sets the unit of the metric.

primaryAggregationType.description: Gets or sets the primary aggregation type value defining how to use the values for display.

resourceId.description: Gets or sets the resource identifier of the resource that has emitted the metric.

metricAvailabilities.description: Gets or sets the collection of what aggregation intervals are available to be queried.

properties.description: Gets or sets the collection of extended properties.

dimensions.description: Gets or sets the collection of availability information defining what timeGrains are available to be queried.

MetricDefinition.description: Metric definition class specifies the metadata for a metric.

value.description: Gets or sets the values for the metric definitions.

timestamp.description: Gets or sets the timestamp for the metric value.

average.description: Gets or sets the average value in the time range.

minimum.description: Gets or sets the least value in the time range.

maximum.description: Gets or sets the greatest value in the time range.

total.description: Gets or sets the sum of all of the values in the time range.

count.description: Gets or sets the number of samples in the time range. Can be used to determine the number of values that contributed to the average value.

last.description: Gets or sets the last sample in the time range.

properties.description: Gets or sets the collection of extended properties.

name.description: Gets or sets the name and the display name of the metric.

unit.description: Gets or sets the unit of the metric.

timeGrain.description: Gets or sets the time grain of the metric. Also known as the aggregation interval or frequency.

startTime.description: Gets or sets the start time.

endTime.description: Gets or sets the end time.

metricValues.description: Gets or sets the collection of actual metric values.

resourceId.description: Gets or sets the resource ID of the resource that has emitted the metric.

properties.description: Gets or sets the collection of extended properties.

dimensionName.description: Gets or sets the name of the dimension.

dimensionValue.description: Gets or sets the value of the dimension.

Metric.description: A metric value set represents a set of metric values in a time period.

value.description: Gets or sets the value of the collection.

MetricCollection.description: The collection of metric value sets.

name.description: Gets or sets the usage metric name and display name.

currentValue.description: Gets or sets the current value for the usage metric.

id.description: Gets or sets the id for the usage metric.

limit.description: Gets or sets the quota limit the usage metric.

unit.description: Gets or sets the unit for the usage metric.

nextResetTime.description: Gets or sets the next reset time for the current value.

quotaPeriod.description: Gets or sets the amount of time it takes to reset the value.

value.description: Gets or sets the usage values.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.
